channel.title: Bradcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Big E Institute of Higher Learning
channel.itunes:author: Brad Evenson

item.title: BradCast 2-18-08
item.description: Today I take a look at Kosovo's soveriegnty, possible plagiarism in the Obama camp, and potential problems with the beloved spiral fluorescent light bulb. Welcome back!
item.dc:creator: Brad Evenson
item.itunes:summary: Today I take a look at Kosovo's soveriegnty, possible plagiarism in the Obama camp, and potential problems with the beloved spiral fluorescent light bulb. Welcome back!

item.title: BradCast 5-16-07
item.description: Greetings! Back from break, here's a quick memo to tide you over -- My editorial on Congress's spending bill!
item.dc:creator: Brad Evenson
item.itunes:summary: Greetings! Back from break, here's a quick memo to tide you over -- My editorial on Congress's spending bill!

item.title: BradCast 2-15-07
item.description: Get your sneak preview of Fox News Channel's "1/2 Hour News Hour" featuring Rush Limbaugh. I also discuss Al Franken's senate bid, moveon.org's petition to President Bush, and CBS News' coverage of 2008 presidential hopefuls. Gather round, the BradCast is on!
item.dc:creator: Brad Evenson
item.itunes:summary:
Get your sneak preview of Fox News Channel's "1/2 Hour News Hour" featuring Rush Limbaugh. I also discuss Al Franken's senate bid, moveon.org's petition to President Bush, and CBS News' coverage of 2008 presidential hopefuls.
Gather round, the BradCast is on!

item.title: BradCast 2-1-07
item.description: Join the hundreds that listen to the BradCast every month! This episode we look at the March for Life rally, Boston bomb scare, Ford, Dick Morris and you get my Super Bowl XLI breakdown and prediction!
item.dc:creator: Brad Evenson
item.itunes:summary:
Join the hundreds that listen to the BradCast every month!
This episode we look at the March for Life rally, Boston bomb scare, Ford, Dick Morris and you get my Super Bowl XLI breakdown and prediction!

item.title: BradCast 1-10-07
item.description: Don't miss my exclusive interview with Kansas City Royals radio broadcaster Ryan Lefebvre, prep basketball rankings, and a preview of President Bush's address to the nation! Thanks for listening!
item.dc:creator: Brad Evenson
item.itunes:summary: Don't miss my exclusive interview with Kansas City Royals radio broadcaster Ryan Lefebvre, prep basketball rankings, and a preview of President Bush's address to the nation! Thanks for listening!

item.title: BradCast 10-24
item.description: Today we take a look at the World Series, Ford's demise, NBC's mishandlings, the economy and Free Tacos!! Turn up the iPOD, we're live! *BradCast not actually a live broadcast
item.dc:creator: Brad Evenson
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: BradCast 8-24-06
item.description: Welcome to the 8-24-06 edition of the BradCast! Today I look into the Culture War, Howard Dean's latest gaffe, and the MLB playoff picture. Plug in the earphones, we're live! *BradCast not actually a live broadcast

item.title: BradCast 6-21-06
item.description: Hello Everyone! This edition of the BradCast breaks the silence of this program and addresses more happenings in the Culture War in America. Thanks for listening!
item.dc:creator: Brad Evenson
item.itunes:summary: Hello Everyone! This edition of the BradCast breaks the silence of this program and addresses more happenings in the Culture War in America. Thanks for listening!

item.title: BradCast 5-12-06
item.description: Today's BradCast features an exclusive look at Iran President Ahmadinejad's letter to President Bush. Thanks for listening!
item.dc:creator: Brad Evenson
item.itunes:summary: Today's BradCast features an exclusive look at Iran President Ahmadinejad's letter to President Bush. Thanks for listening!

item.title: BradCast 4-24-06
item.description: In Today's BradCast, I look at rising gas prices, China's President Hu's visit with President Bush, and reveal a head-scratcher in the ongoing Culture War in America. Thanks for listening!
item.dc:creator: Brad Evenson
item.itunes:summary: In Today's BradCast, I look at rising gas prices, China's President Hu's visit with President Bush, and reveal a head-scratcher in the ongoing Culture War in America. Thanks for listening!

item.title: BradCast 4-17-06
item.description: Welcome to the BradCast! In this 2nd episode, I expose Ford Motor Company's support for the homosexual agenda and also keep tabs on those Clintons. Thanks for listening!
item.dc:creator: Brad Evenson
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to the BradCast! In this 2nd episode, I expose Ford Motor Company's support for the homosexual agenda and also keep tabs on those Clintons. Thanks for listening!

item.title: BradCast 4-11-06
item.description: The BradCast strives to bring sensibility to current events and sift truth through where others relay only the intent of the liberal base and its agenda. I will show what is meant by writers in their "news" stories. Thank you for listening and enjoy!
item.dc:creator: Brad Evenson
